text: Juan Manuel Sandoval Munguia (born 29 October 1966) is a Mexican politician from the National Action Party. From 2006 to 2009 he served as Deputy of the LX Legislature of the Mexican Congress representing the State of Mexico. ==References== Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Guerrero Category:Members of the Chamber of Deputies (Mexico) Category:National Action Party (Mexico) politicians Category:21st- century Mexican politicians
title: Juan Manuel Sandoval Munguia
